text: Tiffany Haddish is receiving some heat for a bad joke she made about Bill Cosby. The star of Girls Trip made controversial comments about the actor in an interview with the Los Angeles Times last week. Related : See Why Everyone Is Loving Tiffany Haddish The 37 - year - old was asked about which comedians inspire her, to which she responded : “ I still want to work with Bill Cosby. I don ’ t care, I ’ ll drink the juice. I ’ ll take a nap. I don ’ t give a damn. But seriously, I would love for him to play my grandfather in something. ” Of course, social media went in on the comedian almost immediately.
